originalText.text: I had a very disappointing experience with Dr. Weiss office. I called as a new patient and the office confirmed they take my insurance (Aetna Choice POS II). When I came in for my appointment at 1 pm, I was not seen until 2 pm. While I waited, I could hear the doctor on a zoom with his door opened which meant I heard confidential patient information that I found quite unprofessional. Following my appointment, I paid my co-pay and went home. A few hours later, I received a nasty phone call from the receptionist stating that they actually did not take my insurance and that they would be billing me in full. I was confused as she herself had confirmed my insurance but she said I had lied about the insurance I have. Why would I lie about this? The doctor and office manager also refused to speak with me or help me figure out what had happened. I called my insurance and they confirmed that this office does in fact take my insurance! My insurance also stated that the office originally refused to share their tax ID with her which is typical business practice. It is evident this office is incredibly mismanaged and I most definitely do not recommend!

originalText.text: I have been a Type1 diabetic for 39 years and have NEVER had a better diagnostician or advisor than Dr. Weiss. I have only seen him twice but in theSe two visits he has already transformed my glucose management by suggesting what no endocrinologist has suggested before - and I have seen more than a few so called experts - to et me to the point of almost perfect glucose level control. By a combination of the right measures of insulin doses - for both corrective and prospective purposes - with very simple nutritional advice on carbohydrate management while acknowledging it's difficulties. I cannot recommend him highly enough. He is truly superb.

originalText.text: Dr. Weiss couldn't be more personable and professional. He chose a reasoned course of action, explained everything in very clear terms, and has been nothing but compassionate and straightforward throughout. His staff is terrific, as well.

text.text: Dr. Weiss couldn't be more personable and professional. He chose a reasoned course of action, explained everything in very clear terms, and has been nothing but compassionate and straightforward throughout. His staff is terrific, as well.

originalText.text: I've been with Dr. Weiss and his amazing team for about two years now and hope he never retires.
